RemediationStrings.Title: Nessus Agent version must be 10.2.0.0 or higher. Value discovered was: {ActualValue}.
RemediationStrings.Description: Nessus Agent version must be 10.2.0.0 or higher. Please contact your Administrator

RemediationStrings.Title: The Tenable Agent service must be installed
RemediationStrings.Description: Nessus Agent is not installed or service has failed to install

RemediationStrings.Title: The Tenable Agent must be running. Current service state is: {ActualValue}.
RemediationStrings.Description: The Tenable Agent is not in the running state
